sentence.Network_en: Objective To observe the effects of long - pulsed Alexandrite laser on hair removal.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨长脉冲翠绿宝石激光脱毛的临床疗效.

sentence.Network_en: Alexandrite laser is one of the superior tunable solid - lasers.
sentence.Network_cn: 紫翠宝石激光器是迄今为止较好的固体可调谐激光器之一.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To evaluate the effect of hair removal using alexandrite laser.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 评价翠绿宝石激光脱毛治疗的疗效.
